name: egoroof-blowfish
description: Blowfish encryption library for browsers and Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:concat && npm run build:transpile && npm run build:wrap && npm run build:compress
scripts.build:concat: rollup -f es -i src/Blowfish.js -o dist/blowfish.js && node tools/show_dist_size
scripts.build:wrap: rollup -f umd -n Blowfish -i dist/blowfish.js -o dist/blowfish.js && node tools/show_dist_size
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.version: node tools/prepare_readme && git add package.json README.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: egoroof
